STEINYTIPS.TITLE: Tiago, analyzing your results to date, let me help you with some tips to make yourself unbeatable:
STEINYTIPS.FIRSTTIP: Interact as much as possible with me to get to know you better
STEINYTIPS.SECONDTIP: Ask your teacher what are your biggest difficulties, as he can help you here on the platform
STEINYTIPS.THIRDTIP: Start the 4th year Math Course to start learning and having fun
